Picture.filename: 1 Silvertones recording their album at Rock Hard Studios - the view from the Chill Out Room
Picture.tooltip: Silvertones recording their album at Rock Hard Studios - the view from the Chill Out Room
Picture.text: This is a view of the Silvertones recording backing tracks to their new album. This picture taken from the window into the Chill Out Room upstairs.

Picture.filename: 2 Billy singing guide vocals while laying down backing tracks for the Silvertones at Rock Hard Studios
Picture.tooltip: Billy singing guide vocals while laying down backing tracks for the Silvertones at Rock Hard Studios
Picture.text: A close up photograph of Matt singing a backing track guide vocal. He can hear a click track, and the instruments, through his headphones.

Picture.filename: 3 Dan recording drums for the Silvertones at Rock Hard Studios
Picture.tooltip: Dan recording drums for the Silvertones at Rock Hard Studios
Picture.text: Dan playing along to the click track and recording the drums - he is totally enclosed by sound baffles to improve the quality of the recording.

Picture.filename: 4 Andrew and Dan discussing the sounds during the Silvertones session at Rock Hard Studios
Picture.tooltip: Andrew and Dan discussing the sounds during the Silvertones session at Rock Hard Studios
Picture.text: Andrew and Dan discussing the finer points of the on-tape sound. Ever since they first started working together these two have found they are an excellent team behind a mixing desk.

Picture.filename: 5 Tom recording guitar for the Silvertones at Rock Hard Studios
Picture.tooltip: Tom recording guitar for the Silvertones at Rock Hard Studios
Picture.text: Tom playing a guide lead guitar part in the Live Room.

Picture.filename: 6 Billy laying down rhythm guitar during the Silvertones recording session at Rock Hard Studios
Picture.tooltip: Billy laying down rhythm guitar during the Silvertones recording session at Rock Hard Studios
Picture.text: Matt playing rhythm guitar guide parts. Piled up next to him are a couple of our amplifiers that we use here. His amp is down the corridor in Room 4 Isolation Room.

Picture.filename: 7 Billy and Tom leaving the Live Room after a successful take at Rock Hard Studios
Picture.tooltip: Billy and Tom leaving the Live Room after a successful take at Rock Hard Studios
Picture.text: Matt and Tom walking from the Live Room into the Control Room to listen back to a take.

Picture.filename: 8 Anders in the groove playing the bass line to a Silvertones song while recording at Rock Hard Studios
Picture.tooltip: Anders in the groove playing the bass line to a Silvertones song while recording at Rock Hard Studios
Picture.text: Anders concentrating on keeping a groove and being in time. Note his right foot: mid-tap. This is always a good idea when recording as if you are tapping your foot to the tempo you will find it easier to stay in time.

Picture.filename: 9 The Silvertones and Management sitting in the Control Room listening to a mix at Rock Hard Studios
Picture.tooltip: The Silvertones and Management sitting in the Control Room listening to a mix at Rock Hard Studios
Picture.text: Relaxing in the Control Room listening back to the days work. It has been a long day, but successful. Left to Right: Matt, Tom, Chris, Dave, Anders and Dan.

Picture.filename: 10 Dan focussed on keeping to the click while recording Silvertones songs at Rock Hard Studios
Picture.tooltip: Dan focussed on keeping to the click while recording Silvertones songs at Rock Hard Studios
Picture.text: Day two and Dan is back in the zone laying down a solid drum track. For this session we used a total of 15 microphones on the kit, doubling up on cymbals and toms to enable us to get a large variety of sounds which we can then pick from during the mixing phase.

Picture.filename: 11 Taking a breath of fresh air during the Silvertones recording session
Picture.tooltip: Taking a breath of fresh air during the Silvertones recording session
Picture.text: This photograph is taken looking out through the shutters from inside the studio. Taking fresh air regularly is important in sessions as it helps you focus. Rambo (the studio guard dog) looks on hopefully.

Picture.filename: 12 Andrew deep in thought whilst recording Silvertones backing tracks at Rock Hard Studios
Picture.tooltip: Andrew deep in thought whilst recording Silvertones backing tracks at Rock Hard Studios
Picture.text: Andrew focussing on the music while controlling the headphone mix for the band. It is important at all times to focus on timing, as this is an equal part to good music along side melody.

Picture.filename: 13 Tom doing lead guitar overdubs on Silvertones songs at Rock Hard Studios
Picture.tooltip: Tom doing lead guitar overdubs on Silvertones songs at Rock Hard Studios
Picture.text: Tom laying down his guitar parts. He is able to sit in the control room to do this which helps him to play along with the actual mix and also be in a controlled physical environment.

Picture.filename: 14 Billy in the Live Room recording backing tracks for the Silvertones at Rock Hard Studios
Picture.tooltip: Billy in the Live Room recording backing tracks for the Silvertones at Rock Hard Studios
Picture.text: Matt in the live room, showing the second floor window into the Chill Out Room. This picture gives you a good idea of the space that we have here at Rock Hard Studios.

Picture.filename: 15 Anders having a bacon butty cooked in the kitchen at Rock Hard Studios
Picture.tooltip: Anders having a bacon butty cooked in the kitchen at Rock Hard Studios
Picture.text: Anders making the most of the catering facilities at Rock Hard Studios by eating a bacon butty, cooked by Tom and Dave.

Picture.filename: 16 Dan laying down a solid groove with Rock Hard Studios' C1000 prominently displayed
Picture.tooltip: Dan laying down a solid groove with Rock Hard Studios' C1000 prominently displayed
Picture.text: Dan playing along to a click track. The two prominent microphones are C1000's. These are industry standard over-head microphones which pick up all the sizzle and snap that a good cymbal provides.

Picture.filename: 17 A look of total concentration from Anders during a take for the Silvertones at Rock Hard Studios
Picture.tooltip: A look of total concentration from Anders during a take for the Silvertones at Rock Hard Studios
Picture.text: Anders completely in the moment while laying down a bass line. This picture shows clearly the focus required to achieve a good result.

Picture.filename: 18 A moment of levity during playback of a Silvertones track in Rock Hard Studios
Picture.tooltip: A moment of levity during playback of a Silvertones track in Rock Hard Studios
Picture.text: It's not all work work work. Here we have the Silvertones sharing a joke about a mistake made during one of the takes.

Picture.filename: 19 Billy captured mid-phrase during the warm prior to recording another Silvertones track at Rock Hard Studios
Picture.tooltip: Billy captured mid-phrase during the warm prior to recording another Silvertones track at Rock Hard Studios
Picture.text: This picture shows Matt in the midst of singing while the band warms up another song.

Picture.filename: 20 Tom taking a close interest in the recording of the backing tracks for Silvertones at Rock Hard Studios
Picture.tooltip: Tom taking a close interest in the recording of the backing tracks for Silvertones at Rock Hard Studios
Picture.text: Tom listening closely while Dan, Matt and Anders record a backing track. Tom will record his parts over the top seperatly.

Picture.filename: 21 Andrew and his famous Purple Penguin cup full of tea at Rock Hard Studios
Picture.tooltip: Andrew and his famous Purple Penguin cup full of tea at Rock Hard Studios
Picture.text: One of the things that makes the session go is tea - and here Andrew demonstrates how he keeps going through long days.

Picture.filename: 22 Silvertones taking a fresh air break to the shop and pub during their session at Rock Hard Studios
Picture.tooltip: Silvertones taking a fresh air break to the shop and pub during their session at Rock Hard Studios
Picture.text: The Silvertones walking round the corner from the studio to the shop and pub during a fresh air break.

Picture.filename: 23 The obligatory rock band photograph at the end of the corridor in Rock Hard Studios
Picture.tooltip: The obligatory rock band photograph at the end of the corridor in Rock Hard Studios
Picture.text: The band gather at the end of the corridor for the obligatory band photographs. This was the least embarassing one we could find.

Picture.filename: 24 Billy and Anders mid take during Silvertones recording session at Rock Hard Studios
Picture.tooltip: Billy and Anders mid take during Silvertones recording session at Rock Hard Studios
Picture.text: Matt and Anders performing a track. As Matt is just laying down a quiet guide vocal he is able to sit down.
